meanings.definition: Slouchiest: superlative form of slouchy, meaning having a drooping or hunched posture
meanings.sent1: She had the slouchiest posture in the entire class.
meanings.sent2: He always looks the slouchiest when he's tired.
meanings.sent3: Even the scarecrow had a less slouchy stance than her, it was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her shoulders were the slouchiest mountains in the landscape of bad posture.
meanings.sent5: The slouchiest student in the room was easily noticeable among the rest.

meanings.definition: Slouchiest: superlative form of slouch, meaning to stand, move, or sit in a lazy, drooping way
meanings.sent1: He would slouchiest in his chair during the boring lectures.
meanings.sent2: The cat looked slouchiest when it was lounging in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The tree seemed to slouchiest towards the ground, as if it was tired of standing tall.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was so low that she seemed to slouchiest through the day.
meanings.sent5: The clouds hung in the sky like the slouchiest giants, casting shadows below.
